statements: SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_description, reported_by FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT event_id, event_description, report_date FROM adverse_events ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT reported_by, count(*) AS num_reports FROM adverse_events GROUP BY reported_by;
SELECT event_id, patient_id, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%fever%';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_description, report_date FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM adverse_events GROUP BY reported_by HAVING total_reports > 1;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_id, patient_id, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = 50 AND event_description LIKE '%headache%';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM adverse_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_type = 'FDA';
SELECT agency_name FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_id = 2;
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT agency_name, agency_type FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_type = 'FDA';
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM AdverseEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT agency_name, agency_type FROM RegulatoryAgencies WHERE agency_type = 'Government'
SELECT quality_metric, patient_safety_rating FROM HealthcareQuality WHERE patient_safety_rating >= 90
SELECT event_description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_type = 'Medication Error'
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_type = 'Medication Error' AND LENGTH(event_description) > 100;
SELECT agency_name, agency_type FROM RegulatoryAgencies WHERE agency_type = 'Government' ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HealthcareQuality WHERE patient_safety_rating >= 4 ORDER BY quality_metric;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM events WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT event_type, event_date, reported_by FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date, reported_by FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT e.event_id, e.event_type, e.event_date, r.report_date, r.report_description FROM events e JOIN event_reports r ON e.event_id = r.event_id WHERE r.agency_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Emergency' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date, patient_id FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT agencies.agency_name, COUNT(event_reports.report_id) AS total_reports FROM agencies INNER JOIN event_reports ON agencies.agency_id = event_reports.agency_id GROUP BY agencies.agency_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC;

SELECT events.event_id, events.event_type, event_details.detail_description FROM events INNER JOIN event_details ON events.event_id = event_details.event_id WHERE event_details.severity = 'High' ORDER BY events.event_id ASC;

SELECT events.event_id, events.event_date, agencies.region, event_reports.report_date FROM events INNER JOIN event_reports ON events.event_id = event_reports.event_id INNER JOIN agencies ON event_reports.agency_id = agencies.agency_id WHERE events.event_date < '2022-09-01' ORDER BY events.event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT patient_id, event_date, severity FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agency_name, location FROM RegulatoryAgencies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC, severity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' AND address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' OR specialty = 'Pediatrics'

SELECT A.event_date, P.first_name AS patient_first_name, P.lastjsoname AS patient_last_name, H.provider_name AS healthcare_provider, R.report_date FROM AdverseEvents A INNER JOIN Patients P ON A.patient_id = P.patient_id INNER JOIN HealthcareProviders H ON H.healthcare_provider_id = P.patient_id INNER JOIN AdverseEventReports R ON A.adverse_event_id = R.adverse_event_id ORDER BY A.event_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryAgencies WHERE location = 'New York'
